text.0: now lift ye up yourselves and look on indras seasonable share.
text.1: if it be ready offer it unready ye have been remise.
text.2: oblation is prepared come to us indra the sun hath travelled over half his journey.
text.3: friends with their stores are sitting round thee waiting like lords of clans for the tribes wandering chieftain.
text.4: dressed in the udder and on fire i fancy welldressed i fancy is this recent present.
text.5: drink indra of the curd of noons libation with favour thunderer thou whose deeds are mighty.
